page.title: 09FARMING
page.content:
Mechanisation has reduced the number of labourers and labourers cottages some of the cottages having been converted into machinery sheds.Most farms are now well equipped with tractors and and wide variety of spraying attachments which either dispense fertiliser or pesticide.
Generally farming is a prosperous activity and the monthly cheque from the Milk Marketing Board has been the foundation of this prosperity for the past twenty years or so.However with the new quotas on milk production imposed by the E.E.C. future financial stability may be harder to achieve.Perhaps new crops will have to be tried.One group of farmers nearby to this area have already successfully started to produce bulbs for export to Holland!
